participant_1.background:
Music is my way to relax and enjoy my time with friends.
i sing in the shower.
i get paid over 5 million a year to dribble a ball.
my wife is a college professor.
regular life disappoints me.

participant_2.background:
My baking will bring happiness to my family and friends.
I went for a walk today after work, even though I was tired
I'm taking my dog to the park in my dapper new suit.
I love starting my day with a swim.
i play drums in a band.

content.text: Just finished my swim and about to make some muffins
Nice! I love baking too, but I am not as good as you I bet
Baking is a great way to relieve stress and it's awesome to be able to share it with others
My wife is a college professor, I'm a professional basketball player, we have a pretty nice life but sometimes I feel like I'm in a rut
I can understand that, it sounds like you have a lot on your plate. Taking time for yourself to relax is important
Yeah I know, I'll try to take some time to myself this weekend
Sounds like a great plan. What do you like to do to relax?
I love to play basketball, listen to music, and hang out with my family
Those are all great ways to relax. I love playing drums and listening to music too
Nice! I've always wanted to learn how to play an instrument
You should definitely try it out, it's a lot of fun
Maybe I will, thanks for the suggestion
